[03] atha ^a^M0.0081^ea^ ra~n~no aarocesu.m -- ``ni.t.thita.m, mahaaraaja, vihaarappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m ^a^P0.0095^ea^, idaani dhammavinayasa"ngaha.m karomaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante, vissatthaa karotha, mayha.m aa.naacakka.m, tumhaaka.m dhammacakka.m hotu. aa.naapetha, bhante, ki.m karomii''ti? ``dhammasa"ngaha.m karontaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sannisajja.t.thaana.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kattha karomi, bhante''ti? ``vebhaarapabbatapasse sattapa.n.niguhaadvaare kaatu.m yutta.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho, raajaa ajaatasattu, vissakammunaa nimmitasadisa.m suvibhattabhittithambhasopaana.m naanaavidhamaalaakammalataakammavicitra.m mahaama.n.dapa.m kaaraapetvaa vividhakusumadaamaolambakaviniggalantacaaruvitaana.m ratanavicitrama.niko.t.timatalamiva ca na.m naanaapupphuupahaaravicitra.m suparini.t.thitabhuumikamma.m brahmavimaanasadisa.m ala"nkaritvaa tasmi.m mahaama.n.dape pa~ncasataana.m bhikkhuuna.m anagghaani pa~ncakappiyapaccatthara.nasataani pa~n~naapetvaa dakkhi.nabhaaga.m nissaaya uttaraabhimukha.m theraasana.m, ma.n.dapamajjhe puratthaabhimukha.m buddhassa bhagavato aasanaaraha.m dhammaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa dantakhacita.m cittabiijani~ncettha .thapetvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa aarocaapesi ``ni.t.thita.m, bhante, kicca''nti.

[03] bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m aaha.msu ``sve, aavuso aananda, sa"nghasannipaato, tva~nca sekho sakara.niiyo, tena te na yutta.m sannipaata.m gantu.m, appamatto hohii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando ``sve sannipaato, na kho pana meta.m patiruupa.m, yvaaha.m sekho samaano sannipaata.m gaccheyya''nti bahudeva ratti.m kaayagataaya satiyaa viitinaametvaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaye ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ``nipajjissaamii''ti kaaya.m aavajjesi. dve paadaa bhuumito muttaa, appatta~nca siisa.m bimbohana.m, etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya ^a^P0.0096^ea^ aasavehi citta.m vimucci. aya~nhi aayasmaa ca"nkamena bahi viitinaametvaa visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto cintesi ``nanu ma.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- `katapu~n~nosi tva.m, aananda, padhaanamanuyu~nja, khippa.m hohisi ^a^V0.0078^ea^ anaasavo'ti (dii0 ni0 2.207). buddhaana~nca kathaadoso naama natthi, mama pana accaaraddha.m viiriya.m, tena me citta.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvattati, handaaha.m viiriyasamata.m yojemii''ti ca"nkamaa orohitvaa paadadhovana.t.thaane .thatvaa paade dhovitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisiiditvaa ``thoka.m vissamissaamii''ti kaaya.m ma~ncake upanaamesi. dve paadaa ^a^M0.0082^ea^ bhuumito muttaa, siisa~nca bimbohanamasampatta.m, etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. catuiriyaapathavirahita.m therassa arahatta.m. tena ``imasmi.m saasane anisinno anipanno a.t.thito aca"nkamanto ko bhikkhu arahatta.m patto''ti vutte ``aanandatthero''ti vattu.m va.t.tati.

[03] atha theraa bhikkhuu dutiyadivase bhattakicca.m katvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa dhammasabhaaya.m sannipatitaa. aanandatthero pana attano arahattappatti.m ~naapetukaamo bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m na gato. bhikkhuu yathaavu.d.dha.m attano attano pattaasane nisiidantaa aanandattherassa aasana.m .thapetvaa nisinnaa. tattha kehici ``etamaasana.m kassaa''ti vutte aanandassaati. ``aanando pana kuhi.m gato''ti. tasmi.m samaye thero cintesi ``idaani mayha.m gamanakaalo''ti. tato attano aanubhaava.m dassento pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa attano aasaneyeva attaana.m dassesi. aakaasenaagantvaa nisiidiitipi eke.

[03] eva.m nisinne tasmi.m aayasmante mahaakassapatthero bhikkhuu aamantesi, ``aavuso, ki.m pa.thama.m sa"ngaayaama dhamma.m vaa vinaya.m vaa''ti? bhikkhuu aaha.msu, ``bhante mahaakassapa, ^b^vinayonaamabuddhasaasanassa aayu, vinaye .thite saasana.m .thita.m hoti,^eb^ tasmaa pa.thama.m vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti. ``ka.m dhura.m katvaa vinayo sa"ngaayitabbo''ti? ``aayasmanta.m upaali''nti ^a^P0.0097^ea^. ``ki.m aanando nappahotii''ti? ``no nappahoti, apica kho pana sammaasambuddho dharamaanoyeva vinayapariyatti.m nissaaya aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadagge .thapesi -- `etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vinayadharaana.m yadida.m upaalii'''ti (a0 ni0 1.228). tasmaa upaalitthera.m pucchitvaa vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaati. tato thero vinaya.m pucchanatthaaya attanaava attaana.m sammanni. upaalittheropi vissajjanatthaaya sammanni. tatraaya.m paa.li --
[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[02] ``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya''nti.
[03] aayasmaapi ^a^V0.0079^ea^ ^a^M0.0083^ea^ upaali sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[02] ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03] eva.m attanaava attaana.m sammannitvaa aayasmaa, upaali, u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa. tato mahaakassapatthero upaalitthera.m pa.thamapaaraajika.m aadi.m katvaa sabba.m vinaya.m pucchi, upaalitthero vissajjesi. sabbe pa~ncasataa bhikkhuu pa.thamapaaraajikasikkhaapada.m sanidaana.m katvaa ekato ga.nasajjhaayamaka.msu. eva.m sesaanipiiti sabba.m vinaya.t.thakathaaya gahetabba.m. etena nayena saubhatovibha"nga.m sakhandhakaparivaara.m sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m sa"ngaayitvaa upaalitthero dantakhacita.m biijani.m nikkhipitvaa dhammaasanaa orohitvaa vu.d.dhe bhikkhuu vanditvaa attano pattaasane nisiidi.

[03] vinaya.m sa"ngaayitvaa dhamma.m sa"ngaayitukaamo aayasmaa mahaakassapatthero bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``dhamma.m sa"ngaayantehi ka.m puggala.m dhura.m katvaa dhammo sa"ngaayitabbo''ti? bhikkhuu ``aanandatthera.m dhura.m katvaa''ti aaha.msu.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[02] ``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[02] ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena dhamma.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa. atha mahaakassapatthero aanandatthera.m dhamma.m pucchi ^a^V0.0080^ea^ -- ``brahmajaala.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``antaraa ca, bhante, raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa.m raajaagaarake ambala.t.thikaaya''nti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti ^a^P0.0098^ea^? ``suppiya~nca paribbaajaka.m brahmadatta~nca maa.navaka''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m brahmajaalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. ``saama~n~naphala.m; panaavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``raajagahe, bhante, jiivakambavane''ti. ``kena saddhi''nti? ``ajaatasattunaa ^a^M0.0084^ea^ vedehiputtena saddhi''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m saama~n~naphalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. eteneva upaayena pa~ncapi nikaaye pucchi, pu.t.tho pu.t.tho aayasmaa aanando vissajjesi. aya.m ^b^pa.thamamahaasa"ngiiti^eb^ pa~ncahi therasatehi kataa --
[21] ``satehi pa~ncahi kataa, tena pa~ncasataati ca.
[22] thereheva katattaa ca, therikaati pavuccatii''ti..

[03] imissaa pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitiyaa vattamaanaaya sabba.m diighanikaaya.m majjhimanikaayaadi~nca pucchitvaa anupubbena khuddakanikaaya.m pucchantena aayasmataa mahaakassapena ``ma"ngalasutta.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti evamaadivacanaavasaane ``nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchii''ti ettha nidaane pucchite ta.m nidaana.m vitthaaretvaa yathaa ca bhaasita.m, yena ca suta.m, yadaa ca suta.m, yena ca bhaasita.m, yattha ca bhaasita.m, yassa ca bhaasita.m, ta.m sabba.m kathetukaamena ``eva.m bhaasita.m mayaa suta.m, eka.m samaya.m suta.m, bhagavataa bhaasita.m, saavatthiya.m bhaasita.m, devataaya bhaasita''nti etamattha.m dassentena aayasmataa aanandena vutta.m ``eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame...pe0... bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasii''ti. evamida.m ^a^P0.0099^ea^ aayasmataa aanandena vutta.m, ta~nca pana pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vuttanti veditabba.m.

[03] idaani ``kasmaa vutta''nti ettha vuccate -- yasmaa ayamaayasmaa mahaakassapattherena nidaana.m pu.t.tho, tasmaanena ta.m nidaana.m aadito pabhuti vitthaaretu.m vutta.m. yasmaa vaa aananda.m dhammaasane nisinna.m vasiiga.naparivuta.m disvaa ekaccaana.m devataana.m cittamuppanna.m ``ayamaayasmaa vedehamuni pakatiyaapi sakyakulamanvayo bhagavato daayaado, bhagavataapi pa~ncakkhattu.m etadagge niddi.t.tho, catuuhi acchariyaabbhutadhammehi samannaagato, catunna.m parisaana.m piyo manaapo, idaani ma~n~ne bhagavato dhammarajjadaayajja.m patvaa buddho jaato''ti. tasmaa aayasmaa aanando taasa.m devataana.m cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ta.m abhuutagu.nasambhaavana.m anadhivaasento attano saavakabhaavameva diipetu.m aaha ``eva.m me suta.m eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa ^a^M0.0085^ea^ ...pe0... ajjhabhaasii''ti. etthantare pa~nca arahantasataani ^a^V0.0081^ea^ anekaani ca devataasahassaani ``saadhu saadhuu''ti aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhinandi.msu, mahaabhuumicaalo ahosi, naanaavidhakusumavassa.m antalikkhato papati, a~n~naani ca bahuuni acchariyaani paaturahesu.m, bahuuna~nca devataana.m sa.mvego uppajji ``ya.m amhehi bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, idaaneva ta.m parokkhaa jaata''nti. evamida.m aayasmataa aanandena pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vadantenaapi iminaa kaara.nena vuttanti veditabba.m. ettaavataa ca ^b^``vutta.m yena yadaa yasmaa, ceta.m vatvaa ima.m vidhi''^eb^nti imissaa addhagaathaaya attho pakaasito hoti.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ idaani ^b^``evamiccaadipaa.thassa, attha.m naanappakaarato''^eb^ti evamaadimaatikaaya sa"ngahitatthappakaasanattha.m vuccate -- ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^P0.0100^ea^ aya.m saddo upamuupadesasampaha.msanagaraha.navacanasampa.tiggahaakaaranidassanaavadhaara.naadiisu atthesu da.t.thabbo. tathaa hesa ``eva.m jaatena maccena, kattabba.m kusala.m bahu''nti evamaadiisu (dha0 pa0 53) upamaaya.m dissati. ``eva.m te abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m te pa.tikkamitabba''ntiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.122) upadese. ``evameta.m bhagavaa, evameta.m sugataa''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) sampaha.msane. ``evameva.m panaaya.m vasalii yasmi.m vaa tasmi.m vaa tassa mu.n.dakassa sama.nakassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.187) garaha.ne. ``eva.m, bhanteti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu''nti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.1) vacanasampa.tiggahe. ``eva.m byaa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaamii''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.398) aakaare. ``ehi tva.m, maa.navaka, yena sama.no aanando tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha. `subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhavanta.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti, eva~nca vadehi saadhu kira bhava.m aanando yena subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa nivesana.m, tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti evamaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.445) nidassane. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha kaalaamaa, ime dhammaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaati? akusalaa, bhante. saavajjaa vaa anavajjaa vaati? saavajjaa, bhante. vi~n~nugarahitaa vaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa ^a^M0.0086^ea^ vaati? vi~n~nugarahitaa, bhante. samattaa samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti no vaa, katha.m vo ettha hotiiti? samattaa, bhante, samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti, eva.m no ettha hotii''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) avadhaara.ne. idha pana aakaaranidassanaavadhaara.nesu da.t.thabbo.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0082^ea^ aakaaratthena ^b^eva.m^eb^-saddena ^a^P0.0101^ea^ etamattha.m diipeti -- naanaanayanipu.namanekajjhaasayasamu.t.thaana.m atthabya~njanasampanna.m vividhapaa.tihaariya.m dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhagambhiira.m sabbasattaana.m sakasakabhaasaanuruupato sotapathamaagacchanta.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m sabbappakaarena ko samattho vi~n~naatu.m, sabbathaamena pana sotukaamata.m janetvaapi eva.m me suta.m, mayaapi ekenaakaarena sutanti.
[03] nidassanatthena ``naaha.m sayambhuu, na mayaa ida.m sacchikata''nti attaana.m parimocento ``eva.m me suta.m, mayaapi eva.m suta''nti idaani vattabba.m sakalasutta.m nidasseti.

[03] avadhaara.natthena ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahussutaana.m yadida.m aanando, gatimantaana.m, satimantaana.m, dhitimantaana.m, upa.t.thaakaana.m yadida.m aanando''ti (a0 ni0 1.219-223) eva.m bhagavataa pasatthabhaavaanuruupa.m attano dhaara.nabala.m dassento sattaana.m sotukamyata.m janeti ``eva.m me suta.m, ta~nca kho atthato vaa bya~njanato vaa anuunamanadhika.m, evameva, na a~n~nathaa da.t.thabba''nti.

[03] ^b^me^eb^-saddo tiisu atthesu dissati. tathaa hissa ``gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya''nti evamaadiisu (su0 ni0 81) mayaati attho. ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetuu''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 4.88) mayhanti attho. ``dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave, bhavathaa''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.29) mamaati attho. idha pana ``mayaa suta''nti ca ``mama suta''nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.

[03] ^b^suta^eb^nti aya.m sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanakhyaataraagaabhibhuutuupacitaanuyogasotavi~n~neyyasotadvaaravi~n~naataadianekatthappabhedo. tathaa hissa ``senaaya pasuto''ti evamaadiisu gacchantoti ^a^M0.0087^ea^ attho. ``sutadhammassa passato''ti evamaadiisu khyaatadhammassaati attho. ``avassutaa avassutassaa''ti evamaadiisu (paaci0 657) raagaabhibhuutaa raagaabhibhuutassaati attho. ``tumhehi pu~n~na.m pasuta.m anappaka''nti evamaadiisu (khu0 paa0 7.12) upacitanti attho. ``ye jhaanappasutaa ^a^P0.0102^ea^ dhiiraa''ti evamaadiisu (dha0 pa0 181) jhaanaanuyuttaati attho. ``di.t.tha.m suta.m muta''nti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.241) sotavi~n~neyyanti attho. ``sutadharo sutasannicayo''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.339) sotadvaaraanusaaravi~n~naatadharoti attho. idha pana ^b^suta^eb^nti sotavi~n~naa.napubba"ngamaaya vi~n~naa.naviithiyaa ^a^V0.0083^ea^ upadhaaritanti vaa upadhaara.nanti vaati attho. tattha yadaa me-saddassa mayaati attho, tadaa ``eva.m mayaa suta.m, sotavi~n~naa.napubba"ngamaaya vi~n~naa.naviithiyaa upadhaarita''nti yujjati. yadaa me-saddassa mamaati attho, tadaa ``eva.m mama suta.m sotavi~n~naa.napubba"ngamaaya vi~n~naa.naviithiyaa upadhaara.na''nti yujjati.

[03] evametesu tiisu padesu ^b^eva^eb^nti sotavi~n~naa.nakiccanidassana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti vuttavi~n~naa.nasama"ngiipuggalanidassana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti assavanabhaavappa.tikkhepato anuunaanadhikaavipariitaggaha.nanidassana.m. tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti savanaadicittaana.m naanappakaarena aaramma.ne pavattabhaavanidassana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti attanidassana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti dhammanidassana.m.
[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti niddisitabbadhammanidassana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti puggalanidassana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti puggalakiccanidassana.m.
[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti viithicittaana.m aakaarapa~n~nattivasena naanappakaaraniddeso. ^b^me^eb^ti kattaaraniddeso. ^b^suta^eb^nti visayaniddeso.
[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti puggalakiccaniddeso. ^b^suta^eb^nti vi~n~naa.nakiccaniddeso. ^b^me^eb^ti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti bhaavaniddeso. ^b^me^eb^ti puggalaniddeso. ^b^suta^eb^nti tassa kiccaniddeso.

[03] tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti ca ^b^me^eb^ti ca sacchika.t.thaparamatthavasena avijjamaanapa~n~natti. ^b^suta^eb^nti vijjamaanapa~n~natti. tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti ca ^b^me^eb^ti ca ta.m ta.m upaadaaya vattabbato ^a^M0.0088^ea^ upaadaapa~n~natti. ^b^suta^eb^nti di.t.thaadiini upanidhaaya vattabbato upanidhaapa~n~natti ^a^P0.0103^ea^.

[03] ettha ca ^b^eva^eb^nti vacanena asammoha.m diipeti, ^b^suta^eb^nti vacanena sutassa asammosa.m. tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti vacanena yonisomanasikaara.m diipeti ayoniso manasikaroto naanappakaarappa.tivedhaabhaavato. ^b^suta^eb^nti vacanena avikkhepa.m diipeti vikkhittacittassa savanaabhaavato. tathaa hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyaa vuccamaanopi ``na mayaa suta.m, puna bha.nathaa''ti bha.nati. yonisomanasikaarena cettha attasammaapa.nidhi.m pubbe katapu~n~nata~nca ^a^V0.0084^ea^ saadheti, avikkhepena saddhammassavana.m sappurisuupanissaya~nca. ^b^eva^eb^nti ca iminaa bhaddakena aakaarena pacchimacakkadvayasampatti.m attano diipeti, ^b^suta^eb^nti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampatti.m. tathaa aasayasuddhi.m payogasuddhi~nca, taaya ca aasayasuddhiyaa adhigamabyatti.m, payogasuddhiyaa aagamabyatti.m.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti ca iminaa naanappakaarapa.tivedhadiipakena vacanena attano atthapa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaasampada.m diipeti. ^b^suta^eb^nti iminaa sotabbabhedapa.tivedhadiipakena dhammaniruttipa.tisambhidaasampada.m diipeti. ^b^eva^eb^nti ca ida.m yonisomanasikaaradiipaka.m vacana.m bha.nanto ``ete mayaa dhammaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa''ti ~naapeti. ^b^suta^eb^nti ida.m savanayogadiipakavacana.m bha.nanto ``bahuu mayaa dhammaa sutaa dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa''ti ~naapeti. tadubhayenapi atthabya~njanapaaripuuri.m diipento savane aadara.m janeti.

[03] ^b^eva.m me suta^eb^nti iminaa pana sakalenapi vacanena aayasmaa aanando tathaagatappavedita.m dhamma.m attano adahanto asappurisabhuumi.m, atikkamati, saavakatta.m pa.tijaananto sappurisabhuumi.m okkamati. tathaa asaddhammaa citta.m vu.t.thaapeti, saddhamme citta.m pati.t.thaapeti. ``kevala.m sutameveta.m mayaa, tasseva tu bhagavato vacana.m ^a^P0.0104^ea^ arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti ca diipento attaana.m parimoceti, satthaara.m apadisati, jinavacana.m appeti, dhammanetti.m pati.t.thaapeti.

[03] apica ``eva.m me suta''nti attanaa uppaaditabhaava.m appa.tijaananto purimassavana.m vivaranto ``sammukhaa pa.tiggahitamida.m mayaa tassa bhagavato catuvesaarajjavisaaradassa ^a^M0.0089^ea^ dasabaladharassa aasabha.t.thaana.t.thaayino siihanaadanaadino sabbasattuttamassa dhammissarassa dhammaraajassa dhammaadhipatino dhammadiipassa dhammappa.tisara.nassa saddhammavaracakkavattino sammaasambuddhassa. na ettha atthe vaa dhamme vaa pade vaa bya~njane vaa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa kaatabbaa''ti sabbadevamanussaana.m imasmi.m dhamme assaddhiya.m vinaaseti, saddhaasampada.m uppaadetiiti veditabbo. hoti cettha --
[21] ``vinaasayati assaddha.m, saddha.m va.d.dheti saasane.
[22] eva.m me sutamicceva.m, vada.m gotamasaavako''ti..
[03] ^b^eka^eb^nti ^a^V0.0085^ea^ ga.nanaparicchedaniddeso. ^b^samaya^eb^nti paricchinnaniddeso. ^b^eka.m samaya^eb^nti aniyamitaparidiipana.m. tattha ^b^samaya^eb^saddo --
[21] samavaaye kha.ne kaale, samuuhe hetudi.t.thisu.
[22] pa.tilaabhe pahaane ca, pa.tivedhe ca dissati..

[03] tathaa hissa ``appeva naama svepi upasa"nkameyyaama kaala~nca samaya~nca upaadaayaa''ti evamaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.447) samavaayo attho. ``ekova kho, bhikkhave, kha.no ca samayo ca brahmacariyavaasaayaa''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 8.29) kha.no. ``u.nhasamayo pari.laahasamayo''ti evamaadiisu (paaci0 358) kaalo. ``mahaasamayo pavanasmi''nti evamaadiisu samuuho. ``samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi, bhagavaa kho saavatthiya.m viharati, sopi ma.m jaanissati, `bhaddaali, naama bhikkhu satthusaasane ^a^P0.0105^ea^ sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti, ayampi kho te bhaddaali samayo appa.tividdho ahosii''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.135) hetu. ``tena kho pana samayena uggaahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto samayappavaadake tindukaaciire ekasaalake mallikaaya aaraame pa.tivasatii''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.260) di.t.thi.
[21] ``di.t.the dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparaayiko.
[22] atthaabhisamayaa dhiiro, pa.n.ditoti pavuccatii''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.129) --

[25] evamaadiisu pa.tilaabho. ``sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.28) pahaana.m. ``dukkhassa pii.lana.t.tho sa"nkhata.t.tho santaapa.t.tho ^a^M0.0090^ea^ vipari.naama.t.tho abhisamaya.t.tho''ti evamaadiisu (pa.ti0 ma0 2.8) pa.tivedho. idha panassa kaalo attho. tena eka.m samayanti sa.mvaccharautumaasaa.d.dhamaasarattidivapubba.nhamajjhanhikasaayanhapa.thamamajjhima- pacchimayaamamuhuttaadiisu kaalakhyesu samayesu eka.m samayanti diipeti.

[03] ye vaa ime gabbhokkantisamayo jaatisamayo sa.mvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakaarikasamayo maaravijayasamayo abhisambodhisamayo di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarasamayo desanaasamayo parinibbaanasamayoti evamaadayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakaasaa anekakaalakhyaa eva samayaa. tesu samayesu desanaasamayasa"nkhaata.m eka.m samayanti vutta.m hoti. yo ^a^V0.0086^ea^ caaya.m ~naa.nakaru.naakiccasamayesu karu.naakiccasamayo, attahitaparahitappa.tipattisamayesu parahitappa.tipattisamayo, sannipatitaana.m kara.niiyadvayasamayesu dhammiikathaasamayo, desanaapa.tipattisamayesu desanaasamayo, tesupi samayesu ya.m ki~nci sandhaaya ``eka.m samaya''nti vutta.m hoti.

[03] etthaaha -- atha kasmaa yathaa abhidhamme ^a^P0.0106^ea^ ``yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara''nti ca ito a~n~nesu suttapadesu ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehii''ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso kato, vinaye ca ``tena samayena buddho bhagavaa''ti kara.navacanena, tathaa akatvaa idha ``eka.m samaya''nti upayogavacananiddeso katoti. tattha tathaa, idha ca a~n~nathaa atthasambhavato. tattha hi abhidhamme ito a~n~nesu suttapadesu ca adhikara.nattho bhaavenabhaavalakkha.nattho ca sambhavati. adhikara.na~nhi kaalattho samuuhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttaana.m phassaadidhammaana.m kha.nasamavaayahetusa"nkhaatassa ca samayassa bhaavena tesa.m bhaavo lakkhiiyati, tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m tattha bhummavacananiddeso kato.

[03] vinaye ca hetvattho kara.nattho ca sambhavati. yo hi so sikkhaapadapa~n~nattisamayo saariputtaadiihipi dubbi~n~neyyo, tena samayena hetubhuutena kara.nabhuutena ca sikkhaapadaani pa~n~napento sikkhaapadapa~n~nattihetu~nca apekkhamaano bhagavaa tattha tattha vihaasi, tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m tattha kara.navacananiddeso kato.

[03] idha ^a^M0.0091^ea^ pana a~n~nasmi~nca eva.mjaatike suttantapaa.the accantasa.myogattho sambhavati. ya~nhi samaya.m bhagavaa ima.m a~n~na.m vaa suttanta.m desesi, accantameva ta.m samaya.m karu.naavihaarena vihaasi. tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m idha upayogavacananiddeso katoti vi~n~neyyo. hoti cettha --
[21] ``ta.m ta.m atthamapekkhitvaa, bhummena kara.nena ca.
[22] a~n~natra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhaa''ti..
[03] ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti gu.navisi.t.thasattuttamagarugaaravaadhivacanameta.m. yathaaha --
[21] ``bhagavaati ^a^P0.0107^ea^ vacana.m se.t.tha.m, bhagavaati vacanamuttama.m.
[22] garu gaaravayutto so, bhagavaa tena vuccatii''ti..

[03] catubbidha~nhi ^a^V0.0087^ea^ naama.m aavatthika.m, li"ngika.m, nemittaka.m, adhiccasamuppannanti. adhiccasamuppanna.m naama ``yadicchaka''nti vutta.m hoti. tattha vaccho dammo balibaddhoti evamaadi aavatthika.m, da.n.dii chattii sikhii kariiti evamaadi li"ngika.m, tevijjo cha.labhi~n~noti evamaadi nemittaka.m, siriva.d.dhako dhanava.d.dhakoti evamaadi vacanatthamanapekkhitvaa pavatta.m adhiccasamuppanna.m. ida.m pana bhagavaati naama.m gu.nanemittaka.m, na mahaamaayaaya, na suddhodanamahaaraajena, na asiitiyaa ~naatisahassehi kata.m, na sakkasantusitaadiihi devataavisesehi kata.m. yathaaha aayasmaa saariputtatthero ``bhagavaati neta.m naama.m maataraa kata.m...pe0... sacchikaa pa~n~natti yadida.m bhagavaa''ti (mahaani0 84).
[03] ya.m gu.nanemittaka~nceta.m naama.m, tesa.m gu.naana.m pakaasanattha.m ima.m gaatha.m vadanti --
[21] ``bhagii bhajii bhaagii vibhattavaa iti,
[27] akaasi bhagganti garuuti bhaagyavaa.
[26] bahuuhi ~naayehi subhaavitattano,
[22] bhavantago so bhagavaati vuccatii''ti..
[03] niddesaadiisu (mahaani0 84; cuu.lani0 ajitamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 2) vuttanayeneva cassa attho da.t.thabbo.
[03] aya.m pana aparo pariyaayo --
[21] ``bhaagyavaa bhaggavaa yutto, bhagehi ca vibhattavaa.
[22] bhattavaa vantagamano, bhavesu bhagavaa tato''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0092^ea^ ``va.n.naagamo va.n.navipariyaayo''ti eva.m niruttilakkha.na.m gahetvaa saddanayena vaa pisodaraadipakkhepalakkha.na.m gahetvaa yasmaa lokiyalokuttarasukhaabhinibbattaka.m ^a^P0.0108^ea^ daanasiilaadipaarappatta.m bhaagyamassa atthi, tasmaa bhaagyavaati vattabbe bhagavaati vuccatiiti ~naatabba.m. yasmaa pana lobhadosamohavipariitamanasikaaraahirikaanottappakodhuupanaahamakkhapalaa- issaamacchariyamaayaasaa.theyyathambhasaarambhamaanaatimaanamadapamaadata.nhaavijjaatividhaakusalamuuladuccarita- sa.mkilesamalavisamasa~n~naavitakkapapa~ncacatubbidhavipariyesaaasavaganthaoghayogaagatita.nhupaadaana- pa~ncacetokhilavinibandhaniivara.naabhinandanachavivaadamuulata.nhaakaayasattaanusaya- a.t.thamicchattanavata.nhaamuulakadasaakusalakammapathadvaasa.t.thidi.t.thigata- a.t.thasatata.nhaavicaritappabhedasabbadarathapari.laahakilesasatasahassaani ^a^V0.0088^ea^, sa"nkhepato vaa pa~nca kilesakkhandhaabhisa"nkhaaramaccudevaputtamaare abha~nji, tasmaa ^b^bhaggattaa etesa.m parissayaana.m bhaggavaa^eb^ti vattabbe ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti vuccati. aaha cettha --
[21] ``bhaggaraago bhaggadoso, bhaggamoho anaasavo.
[22] bhaggaassa paapakaa dhammaa, bhagavaa tena vuccatii''ti..

[03] bhaagyavataaya cassa satapu~n~nalakkha.nadharassa ruupakaayasampatti diipitaa hoti, bhaggadosataaya dhammakaayasampatti. tathaa lokiyasarikkhakaana.m bahumaanabhaavo, gaha.t.thapabbajitehi abhigamaniiyataa. tathaa abhigataana~nca nesa.m kaayacittadukkhaapanayane pa.tibalabhaavo, aamisadaanadhammadaanehi upakaaritaa. lokiyalokuttarasukhehi ca sa.myojanasamatthataa diipitaa hoti.

[03] yasmaa ca loke issariyadhammayasasirikaamapayattesu chasu dhammesu bhagasaddo vattati, parama~ncassa sakacitte issariya.m, a.nimaalaghimaadika.m vaa lokiyasammata.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m ^a^P0.0109^ea^ atthi, tathaa lokuttaro dhammo, lokattayabyaapako yathaabhuccagu.naadhigato ativiya parisuddho yaso, ruupakaayadassanabyaava.tajananayanamanappasaadajananasamatthaa sabbaakaaraparipuuraa sabba"ngapacca"ngasirii, ya.m ya.m anena icchita.m patthita.m attahita.m parahita.m vaa, tassa tassa tatheva abhinipphannattaa icchitatthanipphattisa~n~nito kaamo, sabbalokagarubhaavappattihetubhuuto sammaavaayaamasa"nkhaato payatto ca atthi, tasmaa imehi bhagehi yuttattaapi ^b^bhagaa assa santii^eb^ti iminaa atthena ``bhagavaa''ti vuccati.

[03] yasmaa ^a^M0.0093^ea^ pana kusalaadibhedehi sabbadhamme, khandhaayatanadhaatusaccaindriyapa.ticcasamuppaadaadiihi vaa kusalaadidhamme, pii.lanasa"nkhatasantaapavipari.naama.t.thena vaa dukkhamariyasacca.m, aayuuhananidaanasa.myogapalibodha.t.thena samudaya.m, nissara.navivekaasa"nkhataamata.t.thena nirodha.m, niyyaanikahetudassanaadhipateyya.t.thena magga.m vibhattavaa, vibhajitvaa vivaritvaa desitavaati vutta.m hoti, tasmaa ^b^vibhattavaa^eb^ti vattabbe ``bhagavaa''ti vuccati.

[03] yasmaa ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihaare kaayacittaupadhiviveke su~n~nataappa.nihitaanimittavimokkhe ^a^V0.0089^ea^ a~n~ne ca lokiyalokuttare uttarimanussadhamme bhaji sevi bahulamakaasi, tasmaa ^b^bhattavaa^eb^ti vattabbe ``bhagavaa''ti vuccati.

[03] yasmaa pana tiisu bhavesu ta.nhaasa"nkhaata.m gamana.m anena vanta.m, tasmaa ^b^bhavesu vantagamano^eb^ti vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakaara.m gamanasaddato gakaara.m vantasaddato vakaara~nca diigha.m katvaa aadaaya ``bhagavaa''ti vuccati, yathaa loke ``mehanassa khassa maalaa''ti vattabbe ``mekhalaa''ti.

[03] ettaavataa ^a^P0.0110^ea^ cettha ^b^eva.m me suta^eb^nti vacanena yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m desento paccakkha.m katvaa bhagavato dhammasariira.m pakaaseti, tena ``nayida.m atiitasatthuka.m paavacana.m, aya.m vo satthaa''ti bhagavato adassanena ukka.n.thitajana.m samassaaseti.

[03] ^b^eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa^eb^ti vacanena tasmi.m samaye bhagavato avijjamaanabhaava.m dassento ruupakaayaparinibbaana.m dasseti. tena ``eva.mvidhassa imassa ariyadhammassa desetaa dasabaladharo vajirasa"nghaatakaayo sopi bhagavaa parinibbuto, tattha kena~n~nena jiivite aasaa janetabbaa''ti jiivitamadamatta.m jana.m sa.mvejeti, saddhamme cassa ussaaha.m janeti.
[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti ca bha.nanto desanaasampatti.m niddisati, ^b^me suta^eb^nti saavakasampatti.m, ^b^eka.m samaya^eb^nti kaalasampatti.m, ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti desakasampatti.m.

[03] ^b^saavatthiya.m viharatii^eb^ti ettha ^b^saavatthii^eb^ti savatthassa isino nivaasa.t.thaanabhuuta.m nagara.m, yathaa kaakandii maakandiiti, eva.m itthili"ngavasena saavatthiiti vuccati, eva.m akkharacintakaa. a.t.thakathaacariyaa pana bha.nanti ``ya.mki~nci ^a^M0.0094^ea^ manussaana.m upabhogaparibhoga.m sabbamettha atthii''ti saavatthii. satthasamaayoge ca ``ki.m bha.n.damatthii''ti pucchite ``sabbamatthii''ti vacanamupaadaaya saavatthii.
[21] ``sabbadaa sabbuupakara.na.m, saavatthiya.m samohita.m.
[22] tasmaa sabbamupaadaaya, saavatthiiti pavuccati..
[21] ``kosalaana.m pura.m ramma.m, dassaneyya.m manorama.m.
[22] dasahi saddehi avivitta.m, annapaanasamaayuta.m..
[21] ``vu.d.dhi.m ^a^V0.0090^ea^ ^a^P0.0111^ea^ vepullata.m patta.m, iddha.m phiita.m manorama.m.
[22] aa.lakamandaava devaana.m, saavatthipuramuttama''nti.. (ma0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.14).
[03] tassa.m ^b^saavatthiya.m^eb^. samiipatthe bhummavacana.m.

[03] ^b^viharatii^eb^ti avisesena iriyaapathadibbabrahmaariyavihaaresu a~n~nataravihaarasama"ngiparidiipanameta.m. idha pana .thaanagamanaasanasayanappabhedesu iriyaapathesu a~n~natarairiyaapathasamaayogaparidiipana.m, tena .thitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayaanopi bhagavaa viharaticceva veditabbo. so hi eka.m iriyaapathabaadhana.m aparena iriyaapathena vicchinditvaa aparipatanta.m attabhaava.m harati pavatteti. tasmaa viharatiiti vuccati.

[03] ^b^jetavane^eb^ti ettha attano paccatthikajana.m jinaatiiti jeto, ra~n~naa vaa attano paccatthikajane jite jaatoti jeto, ma"ngalakamyataaya vaa tassa eva.m naamameva katantipi jeto. vanayatiiti vana.m, attasampadaaya sattaana.m bhatti.m kaareti, attani sineha.m uppaadetiiti attho. vanute iti vaa vana.m, naanaavidhakusumagandhasammodamattakokilaadiviha"ngavirutehi mandamaalutacalitarukkhasaakhaavi.tapapupphaphalapallavapalaasehi ca ``etha ma.m paribhu~njathaa''ti paa.nino yaacati viyaati attho. jetassa vana.m jetavana.m. ta~nhi jetena raajakumaarena ropita.m sa.mva.d.dhita.m paripaalita.m, so ca tassa saamii ahosi, tasmaa jetavananti vuccati. tasmi.m ^b^jetavane^eb^.

[03] ^b^anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame^eb^ti ettha sudatto naama so gahapati maataapituuhi katanaamavasena, sabbakaamasamiddhitaaya tu vigatamalamaccherataaya karu.naadigu.nasama"ngitaaya ca niccakaala.m anaathaana.m pi.n.da.m ^a^M0.0095^ea^ adaasi, tena anaathapi.n.dikoti ^a^P0.0112^ea^ sa"nkhya.m gato. aaramanti ettha paa.nino, visesena vaa pabbajitaati aaraamo, tassa pupphaphalapallavaadisobhanataaya naatiduuranaaccaasannataadipa~ncavidhasenaasana"ngasampattiyaa ca tato tato aagamma ramanti abhiramanti anukka.n.thitaa hutvaa nivasantiiti attho. vuttappakaaraaya vaa sampattiyaa tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantara.myeva aanetvaa rametiiti aaraamo. so hi anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa jetassa raajakumaarassa hatthato a.t.thaarasahira~n~nako.tisanthaarena ki.nitvaa a.t.thaarasahira~n~nako.tiihi senaasana.m kaaraapetvaa a.t.thaarasahira~n~nako.tiihi vihaaramaha.m ni.t.thaapetvaa eva.m catupa~n~naasaaya hira~n~nako.tipariccaagena ^a^V0.0091^ea^ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa niyyaatito, tasmaa ``anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo''ti vuccati. tasmi.m ^b^anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame^eb^.

[03] ettha ca ``jetavane''ti vacana.m purimasaamiparikittana.m, ``anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame''ti pacchimasaamiparikittana.m. kimetesa.m parikittane payojananti? vuccate -- adhikaarato taava ``kattha bhaasita''nti pucchaaniyaamakara.na.m a~n~nesa.m pu~n~nakaamaana.m di.t.thaanugatiaapajjane niyojana~nca. tattha hi dvaarako.t.thakapaasaadamaapane bhuumivikkayaladdhaa a.t.thaarasa hira~n~nako.tiyo anekako.tiagghanakaa rukkhaa ca jetassa pariccaago, catupa~n~naasa ko.tiyo anaathapi.n.dikassa. yato tesa.m parikittanena ``eva.m pu~n~nakaamaa pu~n~naani karontii''ti dassento aayasmaa aanando a~n~nepi pu~n~nakaame tesa.m di.t.thaanugatiaapajjane niyojeti. evamettha pu~n~nakaamaana.m di.t.thaanugatiaapajjane niyojana.m payojananti veditabba.m.

[03] etthaaha -- ``yadi taava bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati, `jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame'ti na vattabba.m. atha tattha viharati, `saavatthiya'nti na vattabba.m. na hi sakkaa ubhayattha eka.m ^a^P0.0113^ea^ samaya.m viharitu''nti. vuccate -- nanu vuttameta.m ``samiipatthe bhummavacana''nti, yato yathaa ga"ngaayamunaadiina.m samiipe goyuuthaani carantaani ``ga"ngaaya caranti, yamunaaya carantii''ti vuccanti, evamidhaapi yadida.m saavatthiyaa samiipe jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo, tattha viharanto vuccati ``saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane ^a^M0.0096^ea^ anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame''ti veditabbo. gocaragaamanidassanattha.m hissa saavatthivacana.m, pabbajitaanuruupanivaasa.t.thaananidassanattha.m sesavacana.m.

[03] tattha saavatthikittanena bhagavato gaha.t.thaanuggahakara.na.m dasseti, jetavanaadikittanena pabbajitaanuggahakara.na.m. tathaa purimena paccayaggaha.nato attakilamathaanuyogavivajjana.m, pacchimena vatthukaamappahaanato kaamasukhallikaanuyogavajjanuupaayadassana.m. purimena ca dhammadesanaabhiyoga.m, pacchimena vivekaadhimutti.m. purimena karu.naaya upagamana.m, pacchimena ca pa~n~naaya apagamana.m. purimena sattaana.m hitasukhanipphaadanaadhimuttita.m, pacchimena parahitasukhakara.ne nirupalepata.m. purimena dhammikasukhaapariccaaganimitta.m phaasuvihaara.m, pacchimena uttarimanussadhammaanuyoganimitta.m. purimena manussaana.m upakaarabahulata.m, pacchimena devaana.m. purimena loke jaatassa loke sa.mva.d.dhabhaava.m, pacchimena lokena anupalittatanti evamaadi.

[03] ^b^athaa^eb^ti avicchedatthe, ^b^kho^eb^ti adhikaarantaranidassanatthe nipaato. tena avicchinneyeva tattha ^a^V0.0092^ea^ bhagavato vihaare idamadhikaarantara.m udapaadiiti dasseti. ki.m tanti? ^b^a~n~nataraa devataa^eb^tiaadi. tattha ^b^a~n~nataraa^eb^ti aniyamitaniddeso. saa hi naamagottato apaaka.taa, tasmaa ``a~n~nataraa''ti vuttaa. devo eva devataa, itthipurisasaadhaara.nameta.m. idha pana puriso ^a^P0.0114^ea^ eva, so devaputto kintu, saadhaara.nanaamavasena devataati vutto.

[03] ^b^abhikkantaaya rattiyaa^eb^ti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundaraabhiruupaabbhanumodanaadiisu dissati. tattha ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pa.thamo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho, uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti evamaadiisu (cuu.lava0 383; a0 ni0 8.20) khaye dissati. ``aya.m imesa.m catunna.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.100) sundare.
[21] ``ko me vandati paadaani, iddhiyaa yasasaa jala.m.
[22] abhikkantena va.n.nena, sabbaa obhaasaya.m disaa''ti.. (vi0 va0 857). --

[25] evamaadiisu ^a^M0.0097^ea^ abhiruupe. ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotamaa''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 2.16; paaraa0 15) abbhanumodane. idha pana khaye. tena ^b^abhikkantaaya rattiyaa^eb^ti parikkhii.naaya rattiyaati vutta.m hoti.

[03] ^b^abhikkantava.n.naa^eb^ti ettha abhikkantasaddo abhiruupe, va.n.nasaddo pana chavithutikulavaggakaara.nasa.n.thaanapamaa.naruupaayatanaadiisu dissati. tattha ``suva.n.nava.n.nosi bhagavaa''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.399; su0 ni0 553) chaviya.m. ``kadaa sa~n~nuu.lhaa pana te gahapati ime sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.naa''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.77) thutiya.m. ``cattaarome, bho gotama, va.n.naa''ti evamaadiisu (dii0 ni0 3.115) kulavagge. ``atha kena nu va.n.nena, gandhathenoti ^a^P0.0115^ea^ vuccatii''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.234) kaara.ne. ``mahanta.m hatthiraajava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.138) sa.n.thaane. ``tayo pattassa va.n.naa''ti evamaadiisu pamaa.ne. ``va.n.no gandho raso ojaa''ti evamaadiisu ruupaayatane. so idha chaviya.m da.t.thabbo. tena ^b^abhikkantava.n.naa^eb^ti abhiruupacchaviiti vutta.m hoti.

[03] ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti ettha ^b^kevala^eb^saddo anavasesayebhuyyaabyaamissaanatirekada.lhatthavisa.myogaadianekattho ^a^V0.0093^ea^. tathaa hissa ``kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya''nti evamaadiisu (paaraa0 1) anavasesataa attho. ``kevalakappaa ca a"ngamaagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya upasa"nkamissantii''ti evamaadiisu (mahaava0 43) yebhuyyataa. ``kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti evamaadiisu (vibha0 225) abyaamissataa. ``kevala.m saddhaamattaka.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa''ti evamaadiisu (mahaava0 244) anatirekataa. ``aayasmato, bhante, anuruddhassa baahiyo naama saddhivihaariko kevalakappa.m sa"nghabhedaaya .thito''ti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.243) da.lhatthataa. ``kevalii vusitavaa uttamapurisoti vuccatii''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 3.57) visa.myogo. idha panassa anavasesattamattho adhippeto.

[03] ^b^kappa^eb^saddo panaaya.m abhisaddahanavohaarakaalapa~n~nattichedanavikappalesasamantabhaavaadianekattho. tathaa hissa ``okappaniiyameta.m ^a^M0.0098^ea^ bhoto gotamassa, yathaa ta.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.387) abhisaddahanamattho. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi sama.nakappehi phala.m paribhu~njitu''nti evamaadiisu (cuu.lava0 250) ^a^P0.0116^ea^ vohaaro. ``yena suda.m niccakappa.m viharaamii''ti evamaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.387) kaalo. ``iccaayasmaa kappo''ti evamaadiisu (su0 ni0 1098; cuu.lani0 kappamaa.navapucchaa 117, kappamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 61) pa~n~natti. ``ala"nkato kappitakesamassuu''ti evamaadiisu (jaa0 2.22.1368) chedana.m. ``kappati dva"ngulakappo''ti evamaadiisu (cuu.lava0 446) vikappo. ``atthi kappo nipajjitu''nti evamaadiisu (a0 ni0 8.80) leso. ``kevalakappa.m ve.luvana.m obhaasetvaa''ti evamaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.94) samantabhaavo. idha panassa samantabhaavo attho adhippeto. yato ^b^kevalakappa.m jetavana^eb^nti ettha anavasesa.m samantato jetavananti evamattho da.t.thabbo.
[03] ^b^obhaasetvaa^eb^ti aabhaaya pharitvaa, candimaa viya suuriyo viya ca ekobhaasa.m ekapajjota.m karitvaati attho.

[03] ^b^yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamii^eb^ti bhummatthe kara.navacana.m. yato yattha bhagavaa, tattha upasa"nkamiiti evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. yena vaa kaara.nena bhagavaa devamanussehi upasa"nkamitabbo, teneva kaara.nena upasa"nkamiiti evampettha attho da.t.thabbo. kena ca kaara.nena bhagavaa upasa"nkamitabbo? naanappakaaragu.navisesaadhigamaadhippaayena, saadurasaphaluupabhogaadhippaayena dijaga.nehi niccaphalitamahaarukkho viya. ^b^upasa"nkamii^eb^ti ca gataati vutta.m hoti. ^b^upasa"nkamitvaa^eb^ti upasa"nkamanapariyosaanadiipana.m ^a^V0.0094^ea^. atha vaa eva.m gataa tato aasannatara.m .thaana.m bhagavato samiipasa"nkhaata.m gantvaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa^eb^ti bhagavanta.m vanditvaa pa.namitvaa namassitvaa.

[03] ^b^ekamanta^eb^nti bhaavanapu.msakaniddeso ekokaasa.m ekapassanti vutta.m hoti. bhummatthe vaa upayogavacana.m. ^b^a.t.thaasii^eb^ti ^a^P0.0117^ea^ nisajjaadipa.tikkhepo, .thaana.m kappesi, .thitaa ahosiiti attho.
[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0099^ea^ .thitaa pana saa ekamanta.m .thitaa ahuuti?
[21] ``na pacchato na purato, naapi aasannaduurato.
[27] na kacche nopi pa.tivaate, na caapi o.natu.n.nate.
[22] ime dose vivajjetvaa, ekamanta.m .thitaa ahuu''ti..

[03] kasmaa panaaya.m a.t.thaasi eva, na nisiidiiti? lahu.m nivattitukaamataaya. devataayo hi ka~ncideva atthavasa.m pa.ticca sucipuriso viya vacca.t.thaana.m manussaloka.m aagacchanti. pakatiyaa pana taasa.m yojanasatato pabhuti manussaloko duggandhataaya pa.tikuulo hoti, na ettha abhiramanti, tena saa aagatakicca.m katvaa lahu.m nivattitukaamataaya na nisiidi. yassa ca gamanaadiiriyaapathaparissamassa vinodanattha.m nisiidanti, so devaana.m parissamo natthi, tasmaapi na nisiidi. ye ca mahaasaavakaa bhagavanta.m parivaaretvaa .thitaa, te patimaaneti, tasmaapi na nisiidi. apica bhagavati gaaraveneva na nisiidi. devataana~nhi nisiiditukaamaana.m aasana.m nibbattati, ta.m anicchamaanaa nisajjaaya cittampi akatvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.

[03] ^b^ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa^eb^ti eva.m imehi kaara.nehi ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa. ^b^bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasii^eb^ti bhagavanta.m akkharapadaniyamitaganthitena vacanena abhaasiiti attho. katha.m? ^b^bahuu devaa manussaa ca...pe0... bruuhi ma"ngalamuttama^eb^nti.

[03] tattha yasmaa ^b^``evamiccaadipaa.thassa, attha.m naanappakaarato. va.n.nayanto samu.t.thaana.m, vatvaa''^eb^ti maatikaa .thapitaa, tassa ca samu.t.thaanassa aya.m vattabbataaya okaaso, tasmaa ma"ngalapa~nhasamu.t.thaana.m taava vatvaa pacchaa imesa.m gaathaapadaanamattha.m ^a^P0.0118^ea^ va.n.nayissaami. ki~nca ma"ngalapa~nhasamu.t.thaana.m? jambudiipe ^a^V0.0095^ea^ kira tattha tattha nagaradvaarasanthaagaarasabhaadiisu mahaajano sannipatitvaa hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m datvaa naanappakaara.m siitaahara.naadikatha.m kathaapeti, ekekaa kathaa catumaasaccayena ni.t.thaati. tattha ekadivasa.m ma"ngalakathaa samu.t.thaasi ``ki.m nu kho ma"ngala.m, ki.m di.t.tha.m ma"ngala.m, suta.m ma"ngala.m, muta.m ma"ngala.m, ko ma"ngala.m jaanaatii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0100^ea^ di.t.thama"ngaliko naameko puriso aaha ``aha.m ma"ngala.m jaanaami, di.t.tha.m loke ma"ngala.m di.t.tha.m naama abhima"ngalasammata.m ruupa.m. seyyathida.m -- idhekacco kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya caatakasaku.na.m vaa passati, beluvala.t.thi.m vaa gabbhini.m vaa kumaarake vaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatte pu.n.nagha.te vaa allarohitamaccha.m vaa aaja~n~na.m vaa aaja~n~naratha.m vaa usabha.m vaa gaavi.m vaa kapila.m vaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci evaruupa.m abhima"ngalasammata.m ruupa.m passati, ida.m vuccati di.t.thama"ngala''nti. tassa vacana.m ekacce aggahesu.m, ekacce na aggahesu.m. ye na aggahesu.m, te tena saha vivadi.msu.

[03] atha sutama"ngaliko naama eko puriso aaha -- ``cakkhunaameta.m, bho, sucimpi passati asucimpi, tathaa sundarampi, asundarampi, manaapampi, amanaapampi. yadi tena di.t.tha.m ma"ngala.m siyaa, sabbampi ma"ngala.m siyaa. tasmaa na di.t.tha.m ma"ngala.m, apica ^a^P0.0119^ea^ kho pana suta.m ma"ngala.m. suta.m naama abhima"ngalasammato saddo. seyyathida.m? idhekacco kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya va.d.dhaati vaa va.d.dhamaanaati vaa pu.n.naati vaa phussaati vaa sumanaati vaa siriiti vaa siriva.d.dhaati vaa ajja sunakkhatta.m sumuhutta.m sudivasa.m suma"ngalanti evaruupa.m vaa ya.mki~nci abhima"ngalasammata.m sadda.m su.naati, ida.m vuccati sutama"ngala''nti. tassaapi vacana.m ekacce aggahesu.m, ekacce na aggahesu.m. ye na aggahesu.m, te tena saha vivadi.msu.

[03] atha mutama"ngaliko naameko puriso aaha ``sotampi hi naameta.m, bho, saadhumpi asaadhumpi manaapampi amanaapampi sadda.m su.naati. yadi tena suta.m ma"ngala.m siyaa, sabbampi ma"ngala.m siyaa. tasmaa na suta.m ma"ngala.m, apica kho pana muta.m ma"ngala.m. muta.m naama abhima"ngalasammata.m gandharasapho.t.thabba.m. seyyathida.m -- idhekacco kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya padumagandhaadipupphagandha.m vaa ghaayati, phussadantaka.t.tha.m vaa khaadati, pathavi.m vaa aamasati, haritasassa.m vaa allagomaya.m vaa kacchapa.m vaa tila.m vaa puppha.m vaa phala.m vaa aamasati, phussamattikaaya vaa sammaa limpati, phussasaa.taka.m vaa nivaaseti, phussave.thana.m vaa dhaareti. ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci evaruupa.m abhima"ngalasammata.m gandha.m vaa ghaayati, rasa.m vaa saayati, pho.t.thabba.m ^a^V0.0096^ea^ vaa phusati, ida.m vuccati mutama"ngala''nti. tassaapi vacana.m ekacce aggahesu.m, ekacce na aggahesu.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0101^ea^ na di.t.thama"ngaliko sutamutama"ngalike asakkhi ~naapetu.m, na tesa.m a~n~nataro itare dve. tesu ca manussesu ye di.t.thama"ngalikassa vacana.m ga.nhi.msu, te ``di.t.tha.myeva ma"ngala''nti gataa. ye sutamutama"ngalikaana.m, te ``suta.myeva muta.myeva ma"ngala''nti gataa. evamaya.m ma"ngalakathaa sakalajambudiipe paaka.taa jaataa.

[03] atha sakalajambudiipe manussaa gumbagumbaa ^a^P0.0120^ea^ hutvaa ``ki.m nu kho ma"ngala''nti ma"ngalaani cintayi.msu. tesa.m manussaana.m aarakkhadevataa ta.m katha.m sutvaa tatheva ma"ngalaani cintayi.msu. taasa.m devataana.m bhummadevataa mittaa honti, atha tato sutvaa bhummadevataapi tatheva ma"ngalaani cintayi.msu, taasa.m devataana.m aakaasa.t.thadevataa mittaa honti, aakaasa.t.thadevataana.m catumahaaraajikaa devataa mittaa honti, etenupaayena yaava sudassiidevataana.m akani.t.thadevataa mittaa honti, atha tato sutvaa akani.t.thadevataapi tatheva gumbagumbaa hutvaa ma"ngalaani cintayi.msu. eva.m yaava dasasahassacakkavaa.lesu sabbattha ma"ngalacintaa udapaadi. uppannaa ca ``ida.m ma"ngala.m ida.m ma"ngala''nti vinicchayamaanaapi appattaa eva vinicchaya.m dvaadasa vassaani a.t.thaasi. sabbe manussaa ca devaa ca brahmaano ca .thapetvaa ariyasaavake di.t.thasutamutavasena tidhaa bhinnaa. ekopi ``idameva ma"ngala''nti yathaabhuccato ni.t.tha"ngato naahosi, ma"ngalakolaahala.m loke uppajji.

[03] ^b^kolaahala.m naama pa~ncavidha.m^eb^ kappakolaahala.m, cakkavattikolaahala.m, buddhakolaahala.m, ma"ngalakolaahala.m, moneyyakolaahalanti. tattha kaamaavacaradevaa muttasiraa viki.n.nakesaa rudammukhaa assuuni hatthehi pu~nchamaanaa rattavatthanivatthaa ativiya viruupavesadhaarino hutvaa ``vassasatasahassaccayena kappu.t.thaana.m hohiti, aya.m loko vinassissati, mahaasamuddo sussissati, aya~nca mahaapathavii sineru ca pabbataraajaa ^a^P0.0121^ea^ u.d.dhayhissati vinassissati, yaava brahmalokaa lokavinaaso bhavissati, metta.m maarisaa bhaavetha, karu.na.m mudita.m upekkha.m maarisaa bhaavetha, maatara.m upa.t.thahatha, pitara.m upa.t.thahatha, kule je.t.thaapacaayino hotha, jaagaratha maa pamaadatthaa''ti manussapathe vicaritvaa aarocenti. ida.m ^b^kappakolaahala.m^eb^ naama.

[03] kaamaavacaradevaayeva ``vassasatassaccayena cakkavattiraajaa loke uppajjissatii''ti manussapathe ^a^V0.0097^ea^ vicaritvaa aarocenti. ida.m ^b^cakkavattikolaahala.m^eb^ naama. suddhaavaasaa pana devaa brahmaabhara.nena ala"nkaritvaa brahmave.thana.m ^a^M0.0102^ea^ siise katvaa piitisomanassajaataa buddhagu.navaadino ``vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissatii''ti manussapathe vicaritvaa aarocenti. ida.m ^b^buddhakolaahala.m^eb^ naama. suddhaavaasaa eva devaa devamanussaana.m citta.m ~natvaa ``dvaadasanna.m vassaana.m accayena sammaasambuddho ma"ngala.m kathessatii''ti manussapathe vicaritvaa aarocenti. ida.m ^b^ma"ngalakolaahala.m^eb^ naama. suddhaavaasaa eva devaa ``sattanna.m vassaana.m accayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavataa saddhi.m samaagamma moneyyappa.tipada.m pucchissatii''ti manussapathe vicaritvaa aarocenti. ida.m ^b^moneyyakolaahala.m^eb^ naama. imesu pa~ncasu kolaahalesu devamanussaana.m ida.m ma"ngalakolaahala.m loke uppajji.

[03] atha devesu ca manussesu ca vicinitvaa vicinitvaa ma"ngalaani alabhamaanesu dvaadasanna.m vassaana.m accayena taavati.msakaayikaa devataa sa"ngamma samaagamma eva.m samacintesu.m ``seyyathaapi naama gharasaamiko antogharajanaana.m, gaamasaamiko gaamavaasiina.m ^a^P0.0122^ea^, raajaa sabbamanussaana.m, evameva aya.m sakko devaanamindo amhaaka.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca yadida.m pu~n~nena tejena issariyena pa~n~naaya dvinna.m devalokaana.m adhipati, ya.mnuuna maya.m sakka.m devaanaminda.m etamattha.m puccheyyaamaa''ti. taa sakkassa santika.m gantvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m ta"nkha.naanuruupanivaasanaabhara.nasassirikasariira.m a.d.dhateyyako.tiaccharaaga.naparivuta.m paaricchattakamuule pa.n.dukambalavaraasane nisinna.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m .thatvaa etadavocu.m ``yagghe, maarisa, jaaneyyaasi, etarahi ma"ngalapa~nhaa samu.t.thitaa, eke `di.t.tha.m ma"ngala'nti vadanti, eke `suta.m ma"ngala'nti, eke `muta.m ma"ngala'nti, tattha maya~nca a~n~ne ca ani.t.tha"ngataa, saadhu vata no tva.m yaathaavato byaakarohii''ti. devaraajaa pakatiyaapi pa~n~navaa ``aya.m ma"ngalakathaa kattha pa.thama.m samu.t.thitaa''ti aaha. ``maya.m, deva, caatumahaaraajikaana.m assumhaa''ti aaha.msu. tato caatumahaaraajikaa aakaasa.t.thadevataana.m, aakaasa.t.thadevataa bhummadevataana.m, bhummadevataa manussaarakkhadevataana.m, manussaarakkhadevataa ``manussaloke samu.t.thitaa''ti aaha.msu.

[03] atha devaanamindo ``sammaasambuddho kattha vasatii''ti pucchi. ``manussaloke devaa''ti aaha.msu. ta.m bhagavanta.m koci pucchiiti, na koci devaati ^a^M0.0103^ea^. kinnu naama tumhe maarisaa aggi.m cha.d.detvaa khajjopanaka.m ujjaaletha, yena tumhe anavasesama"ngaladesaka.m ta.m bhagavanta.m atikkamitvaa ma.m pucchitabba.m ma~n~natha, aagacchatha maarisaa, ta.m bhagavanta.m pucchaama, addhaa sassirika.m pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m labhissaamaati eka.m devaputta.m aa.naapesi ``ta.m bhagavanta.m pucchaa''ti. so ^a^P0.0123^ea^ devaputto ^a^V0.0098^ea^ ta"nkha.naanuruupena ala"nkaarena attaana.m ala"nkaritvaa vijjuriva vijjotamaano devaga.naparivuto jetavanamahaavihaara.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m .thatvaa ma"ngalapa~nha.m pucchanto gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi ^b^``bahuu devaa manussaa caa''^eb^ti.
[03] ida.m ma"ngalapa~nhasamu.t.thaana.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ idaani gaathaapadaana.m atthava.n.nanaa hoti. ^b^bahuu^eb^ti aniyamitasa"nkhyaaniddeso, tena anekasataa anekasahassaa anekasatasahassaati vutta.m hoti. dibbantiiti ^b^devaa,^eb^ pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi kii.lanti, attano vaa siriyaa jotentiiti attho. apica ^b^devaa^eb^ti tividhaa devaa sammutiupapattivisuddhivasena. yathaaha --

[02] ``devaati tayo devaa -- sammutidevaa, upapattidevaa, visuddhidevaa. tattha sammutidevaa naama raajaano deviyo raajakumaaraa. upapattidevaa naama caatumahaaraajike deve upaadaaya taduttaridevaa. visuddhidevaa naama arahanto vuccantii''ti (cuu.lani0 dhotakamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 32, paaraayanaanugiitigaathaaniddesa 119).

[03] tesu idha upapattidevaa adhippetaa. manuno apaccaati ^b^manussaa^eb^. poraa.naa pana bha.nanti -- manaso ussannataaya manussaa. te jambudiipakaa, aparagoyaanakaa, uttarakurukaa, pubbavidehakaati catubbidhaa, idha jambudiipakaa adhippetaa. ma"ngalanti mahanti imehi sattaati ^b^ma"ngalaani,^eb^ iddhi.m vuddhi~nca paapu.nantiiti attho. ^b^acintayu^eb^nti cintesu.m ^b^aaka"nkhamaanaa^eb^ti icchamaanaa patthayamaanaa pihayamaanaa. ^b^sotthaana^eb^nti sotthibhaava.m, sabbesa.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaana.m sobhanaana.m sundaraana.m kalyaa.naana.m dhammaanamatthitanti vutta.m hoti. ^b^bruuhii^eb^ti desehi pakaasehi, aacikkha vivara ^a^M0.0104^ea^ vibhaja ^a^P0.0124^ea^ uttaaniikarohi. ^b^ma"ngala^eb^nti iddhikaara.na.m vuddhikaara.na.m sabbasampattikaara.na.m. ^b^uttama^eb^nti visi.t.tha.m pavara.m sabbalokahitasukhaavahanti aya.m gaathaaya ^b^anupubbapadava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] aya.m pana ^b^pi.n.dattho^eb^ -- so devaputto dasasahassacakkavaa.lesu devataa ma"ngalapa~nha.m sotukaamataaya imasmi.m cakkavaa.le sannipatitvaa ekavaalaggako.tiokaasamatte dasapi viisampi ti.msampi ^a^V0.0099^ea^ cattaaliisampi pa~n~naasampi sa.t.thipi sattatipi asiitipi sukhumattabhaave nimminitvaa sabbadevamaarabrahmaano siriyaa ca tejasaa ca adhiggayha virocamaana.m pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisinna.m bhagavanta.m parivaaretvaa .thitaa disvaa tasmi~nca samaye anaagataanampi sakalajambudiipakaana.m manussaana.m cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya sabbadevamanussaana.m vicikicchaasallasamuddhara.nattha.m aaha --
[21] ``bahuu devaa manussaa ca, ma"ngalaani acintayu.m.
[22] aaka"nkhamaanaa sotthaana.m, bruuhi ma"ngalamuttama''nti..

[03] taasa.m devataana.m anumatiyaa manussaana~nca anuggahena mayaa pu.t.tho samaano ya.m sabbesameva amhaaka.m ekantahitasukhaavahato uttama.m ma"ngala.m, ta.m no anukampa.m upaadaaya bruuhi bhagavaati.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ evameta.m devaputtassa vacana.m sutvaa bhagavaa ^b^``asevanaa ca baalaana''^eb^nti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^asevanaa^eb^ti abhajanaa apayirupaasanaa. ^b^baalaana^eb^nti balanti assasantiiti baalaa, assasitapassasitamattena jiivanti, na pa~n~naajiivitenaati adhippaayo. tesa.m ^b^baalaana.m. pa.n.ditaana^eb^nti pa.n.dantiiti pa.n.ditaa, sandi.t.thikasamparaayikesu atthesu ~naa.nagatiyaa gacchantiiti ^a^P0.0125^ea^ adhippaayo. tesa.m ^b^pa.n.ditaana.m. sevanaa^eb^ti bhajanaa payirupaasanaa ta.msahaayataa ta.msampava"nkataa ta.msama"ngitaa ^b^puujaa^eb^ti sakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanaa. ^b^puujaneyyaana^eb^nti puujaarahaana.m. ^b^eta.m ma"ngalamuttama^eb^nti yaa ca baalaana.m asevanaa, yaa ca pa.n.ditaana.m sevanaa, yaa ca puujaneyyaana.m puujaa, ta.m sabba.m sampi.n.detvaa aaha ``eta.m ma"ngalamuttama''nti. ya.m tayaa pu.t.tha.m ``bruuhi ma"ngalamuttama''nti, ettha taava eta.m ma"ngalamuttamanti ga.nhaahiiti vutta.m hoti. ayametissaa gaathaaya ^b^padava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^atthava.n.nanaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0105^ea^ panassaa eva.m veditabbaa -- evameta.m devaputtassa vacana.m sutvaa bhagavaa ``asevanaa ca baalaana''nti ima.m gaathamaaha. tattha yasmaa catubbidhaa gaathaa pucchitagaathaa, apucchitagaathaa, saanusandhikagaathaa, ananusandhikagaathaati. tattha ``pucchaami ta.m, gotama, bhuuripa~n~na, katha"nkaro saavako saadhu hotii''ti (su0 ni0 378) ca ``katha.m nu tva.m, maarisa, oghamatarii''ti ^a^V0.0100^ea^ (sa.m0 ni0 1.1) ca evamaadiisu pucchitena kathitaa pucchitagaathaa. ``ya.m pare sukhato aahu, tadariyaa aahu dukkhato''ti evamaadiisu (su0 ni0 767) apucchitena attajjhaasayavasena kathitaa apucchitagaathaa. sabbaapi buddhaana.m gaathaa ``sanidaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desessaamii''ti (a0 ni0 3.126; kathaa0 806) vacanato saanusandhikagaathaa. ananusandhikagaathaa imasmi.m saasane natthi. evametaasu gaathaasu aya.m devaputtena pucchitena bhagavataa kathitattaa pucchitagaathaa. aya~nca yathaa cheko puriso kusalo maggassa kusalo amaggassa magga.m pu.t.tho pa.thama.m vijahitabba.m aacikkhitvaa pacchaa gahetabba.m aacikkhati ``asukasmi.m naama .thaane dvedhaapatho hoti, tattha vaama.m mu~ncitvaa dakkhi.na.m ga.nhathaa''ti, eva.m sevitabbaasevitabbesu asevitabba.m aacikkhitvaa sevitabba.m aacikkhati ^a^P0.0126^ea^. bhagavaa ca maggakusalapurisasadiso. yathaaha --

[02] ``puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. so hi kusalo imassa lokassa, kusalo parassa lokassa, kusalo maccudheyyassa, kusalo amaccudheyyassa, kusalo maaradheyyassa, kusalo amaaradheyyassaa''ti.

[03] tasmaa pa.thama.m asevitabba.m aacikkhanto aaha -- ``asevanaa ca baalaana.m, pa.n.ditaana~nca sevanaa''ti. vijahitabbamaggo viya hi pa.thama.m baalaa na sevitabbaa na payirupaasitabbaa, tato gahetabbamaggo viya pa.n.ditaa sevitabbaa payirupaasitabbaati. kasmaa pana bhagavataa ma"ngala.m kathentena pa.thama.m baalaanamasevanaa pa.n.ditaana~nca sevanaa kathitaati? vuccate -- yasmaa ima.m di.t.thaadiisu ma"ngaladi.t.thi.m baalasevanaaya devamanussaa ga.nhi.msu, saa ca ama"ngala.m, tasmaa tesa.m ta.m idhalokaparalokatthabha~njaka.m akalyaa.namittasa.msagga.m garahantena ubhayalokatthasaadhaka~nca kalyaa.namittasa.msagga.m ^a^M0.0106^ea^ pasa.msantena bhagavataa pa.thama.m baalaanamasevanaa pa.n.ditaana~nca sevanaa kathitaati.

[03] tattha ^b^baalaa^eb^ naama ye keci paa.naatipaataadiakusalakammapathasamannaagataa sattaa, te tiihaakaarehi jaanitabbaa. yathaaha ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, baalassa baalalakkha.naanii''ti sutta.m (a0 ni0 3.3; ma0 ni0 3.246). apica puura.nakassapaadayo cha satthaaro, devadattakokaalikaka.tamodakatissakha.n.dadeviyaaputtasamuddadattaci~ncamaa.navikaadayo atiitakaale ca diighavidassa bhaataati ime a~n~ne ^a^P0.0127^ea^ ca evaruupaa sattaa baalaati veditabbaa.

[03] te ^a^V0.0101^ea^ aggipadittamiva agaara.m attanaa duggahitena attaana~nceva attano vacanakaarake ca vinaasenti. yathaa diighavidassa bhaataa catubuddhantara.m sa.t.thiyojanamattena attabhaavena uttaano patito mahaaniraye paccati, yathaa ca tassa di.t.thi.m abhirucanakaani pa~nca kulasataani tasseva sahabyata.m upapannaani mahaaniraye paccanti. vutta~nceta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, na.laagaaraa vaa ti.naagaaraa vaa aggi mutto kuu.taagaaraanipi .dahati ullittaavalittaani nivaataani phusitagga.laani pihitavaatapaanaani, evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici bhayaani uppajjanti, sabbaani taani baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. ye keci upaddavaa uppajjanti...pe0... ye keci upasaggaa...pe0... no pa.n.ditato. iti kho, bhikkhave, sappa.tibhayo baalo, appa.tibhayo pa.n.dito. saupaddavo baalo, anupaddavo pa.n.dito, saupasaggo baalo, anupasaggo pa.n.dito''ti (a0 ni0 3.1).
[03] apica puutimacchasadiso baalo, puutimacchabandhapattapu.tasadiso hoti tadupasevii, cha.d.daniiyata.m jigucchaniiyata~nca paapu.naati vi~n~nuuna.m. vutta~nceta.m --
[21] ``puutimaccha.m kusaggena, yo naro upanayhati.
[22] kusaapi puutii vaayanti, eva.m baaluupasevanaa''ti.. (jaa0 1.15.183; 2.22.1257).
[03] akittipa.n.dito caapi sakkena devaanamindena vare diyyamaane evamaaha --
[21] ``baala.m ^a^M0.0107^ea^ na passe na su.ne, na ca baalena sa.mvase.
[22] baalenallaapasallaapa.m, na kare na ca rocaye..
[21] ``kinnu te akara.m baalo, vada kassapa kaara.na.m.
[22] kena kassapa baalassa, dassana.m naabhika"nkhasi..
[21] ``anaya.m nayati dummedho, adhuraaya.m niyu~njati.
[27] dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammaa vutto pakuppati.
[22] vinaya.m so na jaanaati, saadhu tassa adassana''nti.. (jaa0 1.13.90-92).

[03] eva.m ^a^V0.0102^ea^ ^a^P0.0128^ea^ bhagavaa sabbaakaarena baaluupasevana.m garahanto ``baalaanamasevanaa ma"ngala''nti vatvaa idaani pa.n.ditasevana.m pasa.msanto ^b^``pa.n.ditaana~nca sevanaa ma"ngala''^eb^nti aaha. tattha ^b^pa.n.ditaa naama^eb^ ye keci paa.naatipaataaverama.niaadidasakusalakammapathasamannaagataa sattaa, te tiihaakaarehi jaanitabbaa. yathaaha ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditassa pa.n.ditalakkha.naanii''ti (a0 ni0 3.3; ma0 ni0 3.253) sutta.m. apica buddhapaccekabuddhaasiitimahaasaavakaa a~n~ne ca tathaagatassa saavakaa sunettamahaagovindavidhurasarabha"ngamahosadhasutasomanimiraaja- ayogharakumaaraakittipa.n.ditaadayo ca pa.n.ditaati veditabbaa.

[03] te bhaye viya rakkhaa andhakaare viya padiipo khuppipaasaadidukkhaabhibhave viya annapaanaadippa.tilaabho attano vacanakaraana.m sabbabhayupaddavuupasaggaviddha.msanasamatthaa honti. tathaa hi tathaagata.m aagamma asa"nkhyeyyaa aparimaa.naa devamanussaa aasavakkhaya.m pattaa, brahmaloke pati.t.thitaa, devaloke pati.t.thitaa, sugatiloke uppannaa, saariputtatthere citta.m pasaadetvaa catuuhi ca paccayehi thera.m upa.t.thahitvaa asiiti kulasahassaani sagge nibbattaani. tathaa mahaamoggallaanamahaakassapappabhutiisu sabbamahaasaavakesu, sunettassa satthuno saavakaa appekacce brahmaloke uppajji.msu, appekacce paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m...pe0... appekacce gahapatimahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu. vuttampi ceta.m --
[02] ``natthi, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditato bhaya.m, natthi pa.n.ditato upaddavo, natthi pa.n.ditato upasaggo''ti (a0 ni0 3.1).

[03] apica ^a^M0.0108^ea^ tagaramaalaadigandhasadiso pa.n.dito, tagaramaalaadigandhabandhapalive.thanapattasadiso hoti tadupasevii, bhaavaniiyata.m manu~n~nata~nca aapajjati vi~n~nuuna.m. vuttampi ceta.m --
[21] ``tagara~nca ^a^P0.0129^ea^ palaasena, yo naro upanayhati.
[22] pattaapi surabhii vaayanti, eva.m dhiiruupasevanaa''ti.. (itivu0 76; jaa0 1.15.184; 2.22.1258).
[03] akittipa.n.dito caapi sakkena devaanamindena vare diyyamaane evamaaha --
[21] ``dhiira.m ^a^V0.0103^ea^ passe su.ne dhiira.m, dhiirena saha sa.mvase.
[22] dhiirenallaapasallaapa.m, ta.m kare ta~nca rocaye..
[21] ``kinnu te akara.m dhiiro, vada kassapa kaara.na.m.
[22] kena kassapa dhiirassa, dassana.m abhika"nkhasi..
[21] ``naya.m nayati medhaavii, adhuraaya.m na yu~njati.
[27] sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammaa vutto na kuppati.
[22] vinaya.m so pajaanaati, saadhu tena samaagamo''ti.. (jaa0 1.13.94-96).

[03] eva.m bhagavaa sabbaakaarena pa.n.ditasevana.m pasa.msanto ``pa.n.ditaana.m sevanaa ma"ngala''nti vatvaa idaani taaya baalaana.m asevanaaya pa.n.ditaana.m sevanaaya ca anupubbena puujaneyyabhaava.m upagataana.m puuja.m pasa.msanto ^b^``puujaa ca puujaneyyaana.m ma"ngala''^eb^nti aaha. tattha ^b^puujaneyyaa^eb^ naama sabbadosavirahitattaa sabbagu.nasamannaagatattaa ca buddhaa bhagavanto, tato pacchaa paccekabuddhaa, ariyasaavakaa ca. tesa~nhi puujaa appakaapi diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hoti, sumanamaalaakaaramallikaadayo cettha nidassana.m.

[03] tattheka.m nidassanamatta.m bha.naama -- bhagavaa hi ekadivasa.m pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho sumanamaalaakaaro ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pupphaani gahetvaa gacchanto addasa bhagavanta.m nagaradvaaramanuppatta.m paasaadika.m pasaadaniiya.m dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naasiitaanubya~njanappa.tima.n.dita.m buddhasiriyaa jalanta.m, disvaanassa ^a^P0.0130^ea^ etadahosi ``raajaa pupphaani gahetvaa sata.m vaa sahassa.m vaa dadeyya ^a^M0.0109^ea^, ta~nca idhalokamattameva sukha.m bhaveyya, bhagavato pana puujaa appameyyaasa"nkhyeyyaphalaa diigharatta.m hitasukhaavahaa hoti, handaaha.m imehi pupphehi bhagavanta.m puujemii''ti pasannacitto eka.m pupphamu.t.thi.m gahetvaa bhagavato pa.timukha.m khipi, pupphaani aakaasena gantvaa bhagavato upari maalaavitaana.m hutvaa a.t.tha.msu. maalaakaaro tamaanubhaava.m disvaa pasannataracitto puna eka.m pupphamu.t.thi.m khipi, taanipi gantvaa maalaaka~ncuko hutvaa a.t.tha.msu. eva.m a.t.tha pupphamu.t.thiyo khipi, taani gantvaa pupphakuu.taagaara.m hutvaa a.t.tha.msu.

[03] bhagavaa antokuu.taagaare ahosi, mahaajanakaayo sannipati. bhagavaa maalaakaara.m passanto sita.m ^a^V0.0104^ea^ paatvaakaasi. aanandatthero ``na buddhaa ahetuu apaccayaa sita.m paatukarontii''ti sitakaara.na.m pucchi. bhagavaa aaha ``eso, aananda, maalaakaaro imissaa puujaaya aanubhaavena satasahassakappe devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaritvaa pariyosaane sumanissaro naama paccekabuddho bhavissatii''ti. vacanapariyosaane dhammadesanattha.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``ta~nca kamma.m kata.m saadhu, ya.m katvaa naanutappati.
[22] yassa patiito sumano, vipaaka.m pa.tisevatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 68).

[03] gaathaavasaane caturaasiitiyaa paa.nasahassaana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi. eva.m appakaapi tesa.m puujaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hotiiti veditabbaa. saa ca aamisapuujaava, ko pana vaado pa.tipattipuujaaya? yato ye kulaputtaa sara.nagamanasikkhaapadappa.tiggaha.nena uposatha"ngasamaadaanena catupaarisuddhisiilaadiihi ca attano gu.nehi bhagavanta.m puujenti, ko tesa.m puujaaphala.m va.n.nayissati? te hi tathaagata.m paramaaya puujaaya puujentiiti vuttaa. yathaaha --

[02] ``yo kho, aananda, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa upaasako vaa upaasikaa vaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tathaagata.m sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti ^a^P0.0131^ea^ puujeti apaciyati paramaaya puujaayaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.199).
[03] etenaanusaarena paccekabuddhaariyasaavakaanampi puujaaya hitasukhaavahataa veditabbaa.

[03] apica ^a^M0.0110^ea^ gaha.t.thaana.m kani.t.thassa je.t.tho bhaataapi bhaginiipi puujaneyyaa, puttassa maataapitaro, kulavadhuuna.m saamikasassusasuraati evamettha puujaneyyaa veditabbaa. etesampi hi puujaa kusaladhammasa"nkhaatattaa aayuaadivu.d.dhihetuttaa ca ma"ngalameva. vutta~nheta.m --

[02] ``te matteyyaa bhavissanti petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino, ida.m kusala.m dhamma.m samaadaaya vattissanti, te tesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu aayunaapi va.d.dhissanti, va.n.nenapi va.d.dhissantii''tiaadi (dii0 ni0 3.105).

[03] idaani ^b^yasmaa ``ya.m yattha ma"ngala.m. vavatthapetvaa ta.m tassa, ma"ngalatta.m vibhaavaye''^eb^ti iti maatikaa ^a^V0.0105^ea^ nikkhittaa, tasmaa ida.m vuccati -- evametissaa gaathaaya baalaana.m asevanaa, pa.n.ditaana.m sevanaa, puujaneyyaana~nca puujaati tii.ni ma"ngalaani vuttaani. tattha baalaana.m asevanaa baalasevanapaccayabhayaadiparittaa.nena ubhayalokatthahetuttaa, pa.n.ditaana.m sevanaa puujaneyyaana.m puujaa ca taasa.m phalavibhuutiva.n.nanaaya.m vuttanayeneva nibbaanasugatihetuttaa ma"ngalanti veditabbaa. ito para.m tu maatika.m adassetvaa eva ya.m yattha ma"ngala.m, ta.m vavatthapetvaa tassa ma"ngalatta.m vibhaavayissaamaati.
[03] ni.t.thitaa asevanaa ca baalaananti imissaa gaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ eva.m bhagavaa ``bruuhi ma"ngalamuttama''nti eka.m ajjhesitopi appa.m yaacito bahudaayako u.laarapuriso viya ekaaya ^a^P0.0132^ea^ gaathaaya tii.ni ma"ngalaani vatvaa tato uttaripi devataana.m sotukaamataaya ma"ngalaanamatthitaaya yesa.m yesa.m ya.m ya.m anukula.m, te te satte tattha tattha ma"ngale niyojetukaamataaya ca ^b^``patiruupadesavaaso caa^eb^''tiaadiihi gaathaahi punapi anekaani ma"ngalaani vattumaaraddho. tattha pa.thamagaathaaya taava ^b^patiruupo^eb^ti anucchaviko. ^b^deso^eb^ti gaamopi nigamopi nagarampi janapadopi yo koci sattaana.m nivaaso okaaso. ^b^vaaso^eb^ti tattha ^a^M0.0111^ea^ nivaaso. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti puraa atiitaasu jaatiisu. ^b^katapu~n~nataa^eb^ti upacitakusalataa. ^b^attaa^eb^ti citta.m vuccati sakalo vaa attabhaavo, ^b^sammaapa.nidhii^eb^ti tassa attano sammaa pa.nidhaana.m niyu~njana.m, .thapananti vutta.m hoti. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati. ayamettha ^b^padava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^atthava.n.nanaa^eb^ pana eva.m veditabbaa -- ^b^patiruupadesavaaso^eb^ naama yattha catasso parisaa vicaranti, daanaadiini pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni vattanti, nava"nga.m satthu saasana.m dibbati, tattha nivaaso sattaana.m pu~n~nakiriyaaya paccayattaa ma"ngalanti vuccati. siiha.ladiipapavi.t.thakeva.t.taadayo cettha nidassana.m.

[03] aparo nayo -- patiruupadesavaaso naama bhagavato bodhima.n.dappadeso dhammacakkavattitappadeso dvaadasayojanaaya parisaaya majjhe sabbatitthiyamata.m bhinditvaa yamakapaa.tihaariyadassitaka.n.damba rukkhamuulappadeso devoroha.nappadeso, yo vaa pana~n~nopi saavatthiraajagahaadi ^a^V0.0106^ea^ buddhaadhivaasappadeso, tattha nivaaso sattaana.m chaanuttariyappa.tilaabhapaccayato ma"ngalanti vuccati.

[03] aparo nayo (mahaava0 259) -- puratthimaaya disaaya gaja"ngala.m naama nigamo, tassa parena mahaasaalaa, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe. dakkhi.napuratthimaaya disaaya sallavatii naama nadii, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe. dakkhi.naaya disaaya ^a^P0.0133^ea^ setaka.n.nika.m naama nigamo, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe. pacchimaaya disaaya ^b^thuu.na.m^eb^ naama braahma.nagaamo, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe. uttaraaya disaaya usiiraddhajo naama pabbato, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe. aya.m majjhimadeso aayaamena tii.ni yojanasataani, vitthaarena a.d.dhateyyaani, parikkhepena nava yojanasataani honti. eso patiruupadeso naama.

[03] ettha catunna.m mahaadiipaana.m dvisahassaana.m parittadiipaana~nca issariyaadhipaccakaarakaa cakkavattii uppajjanti, eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m kappasatasahassa~nca paaramiyo puuretvaa saariputtamoggallaanaadayo mahaasaavakaa uppajjanti, dve asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca paaramiyo puuretvaa paccekabuddhaa, cattaari a.t.tha so.lasa vaa asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca paaramiyo puuretvaa ^a^M0.0112^ea^ sammaasambuddhaa uppajjanti. tattha sattaa cakkavattira~n~no ovaada.m gahetvaa pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaaya saggaparaaya.naa honti. tathaa paccekabuddhaana.m ovaade pati.t.thaaya, sammaasambuddhaana.m pana buddhasaavakaana.m ovaade pati.t.thaaya saggaparaaya.naa nibbaanaparaaya.naa ca honti. tasmaa tattha vaaso imaasa.m sampattiina.m paccayato ma"ngalanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^pubbe katapu~n~nataa^eb^ naama atiitajaatiya.m buddhapaccekabuddhakhii.naasave aarabbha upacitakusalataa, saapi ma"ngala.m. kasmaa? buddhapaccekabuddhasammukhato dassetvaa buddhaana.m buddhasaavakaana.m vaa sammukhaa sutaaya catuppadikaayapi gaathaaya pariyosaane arahatta.m paapetiiti katvaa. yo ca manusso pubbe kataadhikaaro ussannakusalamuulo hoti, so teneva kusalamuulena vipassana.m uppaadetvaa aasavakkhaya.m paapu.naati yathaa raajaa mahaakappino aggamahesii ca. tena vutta.m ``pubbe ca katapu~n~nataa ma"ngala''nti.

[03] ^b^attasammaapa.nidhi^eb^ ^a^P0.0134^ea^ naama idhekacco attaana.m dussiila.m siile pati.t.thaapeti, assaddha.m saddhaasampadaaya pati.t.thaapeti, macchari.m caagasampadaaya pati.t.thaapeti. aya.m vuccati ``attasammaapa.nidhii''ti ^a^V0.0107^ea^, eso ca ma"ngala.m. kasmaa? di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaverappahaanavividhaanisa.msaadhigamahetutoti.
[03] eva.m imissaapi gaathaaya patiruupadesavaaso ca, pubbe ca katapu~n~nataa, attasammaapa.nidhii caati tii.niyeva ma"ngalaani vuttaani. ma"ngalatta~nca nesa.m tattha tattha vibhaavitamevaati.
[03] ni.t.thitaa patiruupadesavaaso caati imissaa gaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ idaani ^b^baahusacca~ncaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^baahusacca^eb^nti bahussutabhaavo. ^b^sippa^eb^nti ya.m ki~nci hatthakosalla.m. ^b^vinayo^eb^ti kaayavaacaacittavinayana.m. ^b^susikkhito^eb^ti su.t.thu sikkhito. ^b^subhaasitaa^eb^ti su.t.thu bhaasitaa. ^b^yaa^eb^ti aniyataniddeso. ^b^vaacaa^eb^ti giraa byappatho. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati. ayamettha ^b^padava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^atthava.n.nanaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0113^ea^ pana eva.m veditabbaa -- ^b^baahusacca.m^eb^ naama ya.m ta.m ``sutadharo hoti sutasannicayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.339; a0 ni0 4.22) ca ``idhekaccassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti, sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na''nti ca (a0 ni0 4.6) evamaadinaa nayena satthusaasanadharatta.m va.n.nita.m, ta.m akusalappahaanakusalaadhigamahetuto anupubbena paramatthasaccasacchikiriyaahetuto ca ma"ngalanti vuccati. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddhamattaana.m pariharatii''ti (a0 ni0 7.67).
[03] aparampi vutta.m --

[02] ``dhataana.m dhammaana.m atthamupaparikkhati, attha.m upaparikkhato dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti, dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa sati chando jaayati, chandajaato ussahati, ussahanto tulayati ^a^V0.0108^ea^, tulayanto padahati padahanto kaayena ceva paramatthasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha ^a^P0.0135^ea^ passatii''ti (ma0 ni0 2.432).
[03] apica agaarikabaahusaccampi ya.m anavajja.m, ta.m ubhayalokahitasukhaavahanato ma"ngalanti veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^sippa.m^eb^ naama agaarikasippa~nca anagaarikasippa~nca. tattha agaarikasippa.m naama ya.m paruuparodhavirahita.m akusalavivajjita.m ma.nikaarasuva.n.nakaarakammaadika.m, ta.m idhalokatthaavahanato ma"ngala.m. anagaarikasippa.m naama ciivaravicaara.nasibbanaadisama.naparikkhaaraabhisa"nkhara.na.m, ya.m ta.m ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.m kara.niiyaani, tattha dakkho hotii''tiaadinaa (dii0 ni0 3.345; 360; a0 ni0 10.17) nayena tattha tattha sa.mva.n.nita.m, ya.m ``naathakaro dhammo''ti ca vutta.m, ta.m attano ca paresa~nca ubhayalokahitasukhaavahanato ma"ngalanti veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^vinayo^eb^ naama agaarikavinayo ca anagaarikavinayo ca. tattha agaarikavinayo naama dasaakusalakammapathavirama.na.m, so tattha susikkhito asa.mkilesaapajjanena aacaaragu.navavatthaanena ca ubhayalokahitasukhaavahanato ^a^M0.0114^ea^ ma"ngala.m. anagaarikavinayo naama sattaapattikkhandhaanaapajjana.m, sopi vuttanayeneva susikkhito, catupaarisuddhisiila.m vaa anagaarikavinayo, so yathaa tattha pati.t.thaaya arahatta.m paapu.naati, eva.m sikkhanena susikkhito lokiyalokuttarasukhaadhigamahetuto ma"ngalanti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^subhaasitaa vaacaa^eb^ naama musaavaadaadidosavirahitaa. yathaaha ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato vaacaa subhaasitaa hotii''ti (su0 ni0 subhaasitasutta.m). asamphappalaapaa vaacaa eva vaa subhaasitaa. yathaaha --
[21] ``subhaasita.m uttamamaahu santo,
[27] dhamma.m bha.ne naadhamma.m ta.m dutiya.m.
[26] piya.m bha.ne naappiya.m ta.m tatiya.m,
[22] sacca.m bha.ne naalika.m ta.m catuttha''nti.. (su0 ni0 452).

[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0109^ea^ ^a^P0.0136^ea^ ubhayalokahitasukhaavahanato ma"ngalanti veditabbaa. yasmaa ca aya.m vinayapariyaapannaa eva, tasmaa vinayaggaha.nena eta.m asa"nga.nhitvaa vinayo sa"ngahetabbo. atha vaa ki.m iminaa parissamena paresa.m dhammadesanaadivaacaa idha subhaasitaa vaacaati veditabbaa. saa hi yathaa patiruupadesavaaso, eva.m sattaana.m ubhayalokahitasukhanibbaanaadhigamapaccayato ma"ngalanti vuccati. aaha ca --
[21] ``ya.m buddho bhaasati vaaca.m, khema.m nibbaanapattiyaa.
[22] dukkhassantakiriyaaya, saa ve vaacaanamuttamaa''ti.. (su0 ni0 456).
[03] eva.m imissaa gaathaaya baahusacca.m, sippa.m, vinayo susikkhito, subhaasitaa vaacaati cattaari ma"ngalaani vuttaani. ma"ngalatta~nca nesa.m tattha tattha vibhaavitamevaati.
[03] ni.t.thitaa baahusacca~ncaati imissaa gaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M0.0115^ea^ ^b^maataapituupa.t.thaana^eb^nti ettha maatu ca pitu caati ^b^maataapitu. upa.t.thaana^eb^nti upa.t.thahana.m. puttaana~nca daaraana~ncaati ^b^puttadaarassa^eb^ sa"nga.nhana.m ^b^sa"ngaho^eb^. na aakulaa ^b^anaakulaa^eb^. kammaani eva ^b^kammantaa^eb^. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati aya.m ^b^padava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^atthava.n.nanaa^eb^ pana eva.m veditabbaa -- ^b^maataa^eb^ naama janikaa vuccati, tathaa ^b^pitaa. upa.t.thaana.m^eb^ naama paadadhovanasambaahanucchaadananhaapanehi catupaccayasampadaanena ca upakaarakara.na.m. tattha yasmaa maataapitaro bahuupakaaraa puttaana.m atthakaamaa anukampakaa, ye puttake bahi kii.litvaa pa.msumakkhitasariirake aagate disvaa pa.msu.m pu~nchitvaa matthaka.m upasi"nghaayantaa paricumbantaa ca sineha.m uppaadenti, vassasatampi maataapitaro siisena pariharantaa puttaa tesa.m patikaara.m kaatu.m asamatthaa. yasmaa ca te aapaadakaa posakaa imassa lokassa dassetaaro, brahmasammataa pubbaacariyasammataa, tasmaa tesa.m ^a^P0.0137^ea^ upa.t.thaana.m idha pasa.msa.m, pecca saggasukha~nca aavahati. tena ma"ngalanti vuccati. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ``brahmaati ^a^V0.0110^ea^ maataapitaro, pubbaacariyaati vuccare.
[22] aahuneyyaa ca puttaana.m, pajaaya anukampakaa..
[21] ``tasmaa hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca pa.n.dito.
[27] annena atha paanena, vatthena sayanena ca.
[22] ucchaadanena nhaapanena, paadaana.m dhovanena ca..
[21] ``taaya na.m paaricariyaaya, maataapituusu pa.n.ditaa.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti.. (itivu0 106; jaa0 2.20.181-183).

[03] aparo nayo -- ^b^upa.t.thaana.m^eb^ naama bhara.nakiccakara.nakulava.msa.t.thapanaadipa~ncavidha.m, ta.m paapanivaara.naadipa~ncavidhadi.t.thadhammikahitasukhahetuto ma"ngalanti veditabba.m. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ```pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi puttena puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro paccupa.t.thaatabbaa bhato ne bharissaami, kicca.m nesa.m karissaami ^a^M0.0116^ea^, kulava.msa.m .thapessaami, daayajja.m pa.tipajjissaami, atha vaa pana petaana.m kaalakataana.m dakkhi.na.m anuppadassaamii'ti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi puttena puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi putta.m anukampanti, paapaa nivaarenti, kalyaa.ne nivesenti, sippa.m sikkhaapenti, patiruupena daarena sa.myojenti, samaye daayajja.m niyyaadentii''ti (dii0 ni0 3.267).

[03] apica yo maataapitaro tiisu vatthuusu ^a^P0.0138^ea^ pasaaduppaadanena, siilasamaadaapanena, pabbajjaaya vaa upa.t.thahati, aya.m maataapituupa.t.thaakaana.m aggo. tassa ta.m maataapituupa.t.thaana.m maataapituuhi katassa upakaarassa paccupakaarabhuuta.m anekesa.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m samparaayikaana~nca atthaana.m pada.t.thaanato ma"ngalanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^puttadaarassaa^eb^ti ettha attato jaataa puttaapi dhiitaropi ^b^puttaa^eb^icceva sa"nkhya.m gacchanti. ^b^daaraa^eb^ti viisatiyaa bhariyaana.m yaa kaaci bhariyaa. puttaa ca daaraa ca puttadaara.m, tassa puttadaarassa. ^b^sa"ngaho^eb^ti sammaananaadiihi upakaarakara.na.m. ta.m susa.mvihitakammantataadidi.t.thadhammikahitasukhahetuto ^a^V0.0111^ea^ ma"ngalanti veditabba.m. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``pacchimaa disaa puttadaaraa veditabbaa''ti ettha uddi.t.tha.m puttadaara.m bhariyaasaddena sa"nga.nhitvaa ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi saamikena pacchimaa disaa bhariyaa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa sammaananaaya, anavamaananaaya, anati cariyaaya, issariyavossaggena, ala"nkaaraanuppadaanena. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi saamikena pacchimaa disaa bhariyaa paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi saamika.m anukampati, susa.mvihitakammantaa ca hoti, sa"ngahitaparijanaa ca, anaticaarinii ca, sambhata~nca anurakkhati dakkhaa ca hoti analasaa sabbakiccesuu''ti (dii0 ni0 3.269).

[03] aya.m vaa aparo nayo -- ^b^sa"ngaho^eb^ti dhammikaahi daanapiyavaacaatthacariyaahi sa"nga.nhana.m. seyyathida.m -- uposathadivasesu paribbayadaana.m, nakkhattadivasesu nakkhattadassaapana.m, ma"ngaladivasesu ma"ngalakara.na.m, di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikesu atthesu ovaadaanusaasananti. ta.m vuttanayeneva di.t.thadhammikahitahetuto ^a^P0.0139^ea^ samparaayikahitahetuto devataahipi namassaniiyabhaavahetuto ca ma"ngalanti veditabba.m. yathaaha sakko devaanamindo --
[21] ``ye ^a^M0.0117^ea^ gaha.t.thaa pu~n~nakaraa, siilavanto upaasakaa.
[22] dhammena daara.m posenti, te namassaami maatalii''ti.. (sa.m0ni01.1.264).

[03] ^b^anaakulaa kammantaa^eb^ naama kaala~n~nutaaya patiruupakaaritaaya analasataaya u.t.thaanaviiriyasampadaaya, abyasaniiyataaya ca kaalaatikkamanaappatiruupakara.nasithilakara.naadiaakulabhaavavirahitaa kasigorakkhavaa.nijjaadayo kammantaa. ete attano vaa puttadaarassa vaa daasakammakaraana.m vaa byattataaya eva.m payojitaa di.t.theva dhamme dhanadha~n~navuddhipa.tilaabhahetuto ma"ngalanti vuccanti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] ``patiruupakaarii dhuravaa, u.t.thaataa vindate dhana''nti ca (su0 ni0 185; sa.m0 ni0 1.246).
[21] ``na divaa soppasiilena, rattimu.t.thaanadessinaa.
[22] nicca.m mattena so.n.dena, sakkaa aavasitu.m ghara.m..
[21] ``atisiita.m ^a^V0.0112^ea^ atiu.nha.m, atisaayamida.m ahu.
[22] iti vissa.t.thakammante, atthaa accenti maa.nave..
[21] ``yodha siita~nca u.nha~nca, ti.naa bhiyyo na ma~n~nati.
[22] kara.m purisakiccaani, so sukha.m na vihaayatii''ti.. (dii0 ni0 3.253).
[21] ``bhoge sa.mharamaanassa, bhamarasseva iriiyato.
[22] bhogaa sannicaya.m yanti, vammikovuupaciiyatii''ti.. ca evamaadi (dii0 ni0 3.265).

[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0140^ea^ imissaa gaathaaya maatuupa.t.thaana.m, pituupa.t.thaana.m, puttadaarassa sa"ngaho, anaakulaa ca kammantaati cattaari ma"ngalaani vuttaani, puttadaarassa sa"ngaha.m vaa dvidhaa katvaa pa~nca, maataapituupa.t.thaana.m vaa ekameva katvaa tii.ni. ma"ngalatta~nca nesa.m tattha tattha vibhaavitamevaati.
[03] ni.t.thitaa maataapituupa.t.thaananti imissaa gaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ idaani ^b^daana~ncaa^eb^ti ettha diiyate iminaati daana.m, attano santaka.m parassa pa.tipaadiiyatiiti vutta.m hoti. dhammassa cariyaa, dhammaa vaa anapetaa cariyaa ^a^M0.0118^ea^ ^b^dhammacariyaa^eb^. ~naayante ``amhaaka.m ime''ti ^b^~naatakaa^eb^. na avajjaani ^b^anavajjaani,^eb^ aninditaani agarahitaaniiti vutta.m hoti. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati aya.m ^b^padava.n.nanaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^atthava.n.nanaa^eb^ pana eva.m veditabbaa -- ^b^daana.m^eb^ naama para.m uddissa subuddhipubbikaa annaadidasadaanavatthupariccaagacetanaa, ta.msampayutto vaa alobho. alobhena hi ta.m vatthu.m parassa pa.tipaadeti, tena vutta.m ``diiyate iminaati daana''nti. ta.m bahujanapiyamanaapataadiina.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaana.m phalavisesaana.m adhigamahetuto ma"ngalanti vuccati. ``daayako, siiha daanapati, bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo''ti evamaadiini (a0 ni0 5.34) cettha suttaani anussaritabbaani.

[03] aparo ^a^V0.0113^ea^ nayo -- daana.m naama duvidha.m aamisadaana.m, dhammadaana~nca, tattha ^b^aamisadaana.m^eb^ vuttappakaarameva. idhalokaparalokadukkhakkhayasukhaavahassa pana sammaasambuddhappaveditassa dhammassa paresa.m hitakaamataaya desanaa ^b^dhammadaana.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0141^ea^ ^b^,^eb^ imesa~nca dvinna.m daanaana.m etadeva agga.m. yathaaha --
[21] ``sabbadaana.m dhammadaana.m jinaati,
[27] sabbarasa.m dhammaraso jinaati.
[26] sabbarati.m dhammarati jinaati,
[22] ta.nhakkhayo sabbadukkha.m jinaatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 354).
[03] tattha aamisadaanassa ma"ngalatta.m vuttameva. dhammadaana.m pana yasmaa atthapa.tisa.mveditaadiina.m gu.naana.m pada.t.thaana.m, tasmaa ma"ngalanti vuccati. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii caa''ti evamaadi (a0 ni0 5.26).

[03] ^b^dhammacariyaa^eb^ naama dasakusalakammapathacariyaa. yathaaha -- ``tividhaa kho gahapatayo kaayena dhammacariyaa samacariyaa hotii''ti evamaadi. saa panesaa dhammacariyaa saggalokuupapattihetuto ma"ngalanti veditabbaa. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu kho gahapatayo evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti (ma0 ni0 1.439).

[03] ^b^~naatakaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0119^ea^ naama maatito vaa pitito vaa yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa sambandhaa. tesa.m bhogapaariju~n~nena vaa byaadhipaariju~n~nena vaa abhihataana.m attano samiipa.m aagataana.m yathaabala.m ghaasacchaadanadhanadha~n~naadiihi sa"ngaho pasa.msaadiina.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m sugatigamanaadiina~nca samparaayikaana.m visesaadhigamaana.m hetuto ma"ngalanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^anavajjaani kammaani^eb^ naama uposatha"ngasamaadaanaveyyaavaccakara.naaaraamavanaropanasetukara.naadiini kaayavaciimanosucaritakammaani. taani hi naanappakaarahitasukhaadhigamahetuto ma"ngalanti vuccanti. ``.thaana.m ^a^P0.0142^ea^ kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa ^a^V0.0114^ea^ a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyyaa''ti evamaadiini cettha suttaani (a0 ni0 8.43) anussaritabbaani.
